title: The Intimate Lives of the Founding Fathers
description: In The Intimate Lives of the Founding Fathers from Smithsonian Books, historian Thomas Fleming, author of The Perils of Peace , offers a fresh look at the critical role of women in the lives of Washington, Franklin, Adams, Jefferson, Hamilton, and Madison. Fleming nimbly takes readers through a great deal of early American history, as our founding fathers struggle to reconcile the private and publicâ€“and often deal with a media every bit as gossip-seeking and inflammatory as ours today.
author: Thomas    Fleming
